full_summary:
### 3Y004-240035 General Contracting Services Standing Offer


#### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** General Contracting Services Standing Offer for the Polar Canadian High Arctic Research Station

**Reference Number:** WS4585668308-Doc4596929624

**Solicitation Number:** WS4585668308

#### Key Notice Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** CNST (Construction Services)

#### Appointment Opportunities

* The vendor shall provide skilled labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials for general contracting services at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station in Cambridge Bay, Nunavut.
* Services will be provided on an "as required" basis.

#### Period of Contract

* The standing offer will be valid for a period of two (2) years, with option to extend for three (3) one-year periods.

#### Tender Closing Date and Time

* The closing time for the tender has been amended and all submissions must be received by 14:00 Eastern Standard Time on June 26, 2024.

#### Pre-qualification Requirements

* Preference will be given to contractors that are registered on the Inuit Firm Registry

#### Contact Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* El Dela Cruz ( [el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) )

Note: You can now access the tender package through the following links. [English](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19771088?extsite=MTk3NzEwODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) , [French](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19771088?extsite=MTk3NzEwODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

By restructuring the text to maintain the initial observations, this rewritten version eliminates unnecessary details to fit within the 400-word constraint.

Note the original has `numéroReference` & `numéroModification` whereas in this version it uses `Reference Number` and `Amendment Number` respectively (English translation).
